## Deadline

The organization invites abstracts for contributed oral presentations for
the 2024 Adaptive Designs and Multiple Testing Procedures. 
Abstracts may be submitted online until **2 February 2024** using this [**form**](https://www.conftool.org/admtp-workshop-2024)

## Structure

All abstracts must be submitted online. No other forms of abstracts are permissible.
Each abstract submission must include the title, list of authors and author affiliations, and abstract, with each
submission having a maximum length of 2,500 characters.

## Evaluation

All submitted abstracts will be reviewed by the Scientific Committee and presenting
authors will be informed of the status of their abstract by the **16 February 2024**.

All accepted contributed oral presentations will be assigned to a 15-minute slot within a particular scientific
session. All presenting authors must have registered for the conference before the registration deadline date for
their presentation to be included in the conference program.
